{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Online Sales Representative",
  "description": "Goldchek Herbals is a herbal producing and sales company created to solve daily health challenges of her clients. Here we offer you quality,assurance,authentic and lasting solutions. We are professional to the core.

We are committed to revolutionizing the Herbal industry by prioritizing health and wellness above all else. Founded with a vision to redefine the standards of Herbal products, we specialize in offering a comprehensive range of health-enhancing solutions that cater to the diverse needs of our consumers.
&nbsp;

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Online Sales Representative

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Entry-Level Sales Executive to join our growing sales team. This role is focused on generating sales entirely through online channels, requiring proactive customer engagement, effective communication, and excellent follow-up skills.
	The ideal candidate will manage client interactions from inquiry to conversion, ensuring customer satisfaction, repeat business, and a smooth online experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Engage with customers across online sales channels (social media, website, WhatsApp, email, etc.).
	Make follow-up calls and maintain consistent communication with prospects and existing clients.
	Convert online inquiries into successful sales through persuasive communication and relationship building.
	Handle basic customer complaints and provide timely solutions to maintain client trust.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, and feedback.
	Collaborate with the operations and marketing teams to improve customer experience and sales strategies.
	Meet and exceed individual sales targets.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / SSCE.
	0&ndash;1 year of experience in sales, customer service, or telesales (experience in online sales is an advantage).
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong interpersonal skills with a customer-focused attitude.
	Ability to work independently and within a team.
	Basic knowledge of CRM tools, spreadsheets, and online communication platforms.
	Must be proactive, organized, and target-driven.
	Candidates must reside within Surulere or nearby areas.


Compensation


	?60,000 monthly salary
	Attractive commission on sales performance.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;eziakuoutsourcingfirm@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-31",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "GoldChek Herbals"
    
  },

    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

      "minValue": 30000,
      "maxValue": 75000,

    }

}



Online Sales Representative Job at Goldchek Herbals




        
    

        
        Goldchek Herbals is a herbal producing and sales company created to solve daily health challenges of her clients. Here we offer you quality,assurance,authentic and lasting solutions. We are professional to the core.

We are committed to revolutionizing the Herbal industry by prioritizing health and wellness above all else. Founded with a vision to redefine the standards of Herbal products, we specialize in offering a comprehensive range of health-enhancing solutions that cater to the diverse needs of our consumers.
 

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Online Sales Representative

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Description


	We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Entry-Level Sales Executive to join our growing sales team. This role is focused on generating sales entirely through online channels, requiring proactive customer engagement, effective communication, and excellent follow-up skills.
	The ideal candidate will manage client interactions from inquiry to conversion, ensuring customer satisfaction, repeat business, and a smooth online experience.


Key Responsibilities


	Engage with customers across online sales channels (social media, website, WhatsApp, email, etc.).
	Make follow-up calls and maintain consistent communication with prospects and existing clients.
	Convert online inquiries into successful sales through persuasive communication and relationship building.
	Handle basic customer complaints and provide timely solutions to maintain client trust.
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, and feedback.
	Collaborate with the operations and marketing teams to improve customer experience and sales strategies.
	Meet and exceed individual sales targets.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND / SSCE.
	0–1 year of experience in sales, customer service, or telesales (experience in online sales is an advantage).
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Strong interpersonal skills with a customer-focused attitude.
	Ability to work independently and within a team.
	Basic knowledge of CRM tools, spreadsheets, and online communication platforms.
	Must be proactive, organized, and target-driven.
	Candidates must reside within Surulere or nearby areas.


Compensation


	?60,000 monthly salary
	Attractive commission on sales performance.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: eziakuoutsourcingfirm@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Higher Executive Officer",
  "description": "The Federal Polytechnic, Bida was established in 1977 following a decision of the Federal Government of Nigeria to move the institution to Bida. Before then, it was Federal College of Technology,&nbsp;Kano.

The first academic session started in April 1978 with a population of 211 students and 11 senior staff, 33 junior staff. Federal Polytechnic, Bida is a Federal Government tertiary institution situated in&nbsp;Bida,&nbsp;Niger State, Nigeria. Currently, there are seven faculties in the institution.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the vacant position below:

Job Position: Higher Executive Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Bida, Niger
Department: Registry

Qualifications&nbsp;


	Candidates should possess a Higher National Diploma (HND).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Applications alongside their Curriculum Vitae to:
The Registrar,
The Federal Polytechnic, Bida,
P. M. B. 55,
Niger State.

Note:&nbsp;Only shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.",

Higher Executive Officer Job at Federal Polytechnic, Bida




        
    

        
        The Federal Polytechnic, Bida was established in 1977 following a decision of the Federal Government of Nigeria to move the institution to Bida. Before then, it was Federal College of Technology, Kano.

The first academic session started in April 1978 with a population of 211 students and 11 senior staff, 33 junior staff. Federal Polytechnic, Bida is a Federal Government tertiary institution situated in Bida, Niger State, Nigeria. Currently, there are seven faculties in the institution.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the vacant position below:

Job Position: Higher Executive Officer

Job Location: Bida, Niger
Department: Registry
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Qualifications 


	Candidates should possess a Higher National Diploma (HND).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Applications alongside their Curriculum Vitae to:
The Registrar,
The Federal Polytechnic, Bida,
P. M. B. 55,
Niger State.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Officer",
  "description": "Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Business Consulting

Job Summary


	The Social Media Officer will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the company&rsquo;s social media strategy to strengthen its online presence, increase brand awareness, engage clients, and support business growth.
	The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, and passionate about digital communication and content creation.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with the company&rsquo;s brand and marketing goals.
	Manage all official social media platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, X, and TikTok).
	Create, curate, and publish engaging content (graphics, videos, and copy) that resonates with target audiences.
	Monitor and analyze social media trends, insights, and performance metrics to improve engagement.
	Grow followers organically and increase brand visibility across all digital platforms.
	Collaborate with internal teams to promote company activities, services, and HR initiatives.
	Manage paid social media advertising campaigns and report on ROI.
	Respond promptly to followers, inquiries, and online reviews in line with company communication standards.
	Track competitors&rsquo; social media activities and propose innovative engagement ideas.
	Support content creation for newsletters, blog posts, and digital campaigns.
	Maintain a content calendar to ensure consistent posting and alignment with company events.


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Mass Communication, Marketing, English, or related field.
	Minimum of 2&ndash;3 years of proven experience managing corporate social media platforms.
	Strong understanding of digital marketing tools and social media analytics.
	Proficiency in Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar design tools.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and design aesthetics.
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Knowledge of SEO, social media algorithms, and content trends is an added advantage.


Key Skills:


	Social Media Strategy
	Content Creation &amp; Copywriting
	Graphic Design &amp; Video Editing
	Analytics &amp; Reporting
	Brand Storytelling
	Creativity &amp; Innovation
	Communication &amp; Collaboration


Work Conditions:


	On-site role (Port Harcourt office)
	Monday &ndash; Friday, 8:00 AM &ndash; 5:00 PM


Benefits


	Competitive Salary of N200,000 Monthly
	Career growth and development opportunities
	Health and wellness support (HMO)
	Friendly and collaborative work environment


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to:&nbsp;eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Social Media Officer &ndash; Port Harcourt&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Social Media Officer Job at Excel and Grace Consulting




        
    

        
        Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Officer
Job Location: Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Business Consulting

Job Summary


	The Social Media Officer will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing the company’s social media strategy to strengthen its online presence, increase brand awareness, engage clients, and support business growth.
	The ideal candidate is creative, data-driven, and passionate about digital communication and content creation.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with the company’s brand and marketing goals.
	Manage all official social media platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, X, and TikTok).
	Create, curate, and publish engaging content (graphics, videos, and copy) that resonates with target audiences.
	Monitor and analyze social media trends, insights, and performance metrics to improve engagement.
	Grow followers organically and increase brand visibility across all digital platforms.
	Collaborate with internal teams to promote company activities, services, and HR initiatives.
	Manage paid social media advertising campaigns and report on ROI.
	Respond promptly to followers, inquiries, and online reviews in line with company communication standards.
	Track competitors’ social media activities and propose innovative engagement ideas.
	Support content creation for newsletters, blog posts, and digital campaigns.
	Maintain a content calendar to ensure consistent posting and alignment with company events.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Mass Communication, Marketing, English, or related field.
	Minimum of 2–3 years of proven experience managing corporate social media platforms.
	Strong understanding of digital marketing tools and social media analytics.
	Proficiency in Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar design tools.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and design aesthetics.
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
	Knowledge of SEO, social media algorithms, and content trends is an added advantage.


Key Skills:


	Social Media Strategy
	Content Creation & Copywriting
	Graphic Design & Video Editing
	Analytics & Reporting
	Brand Storytelling
	Creativity & Innovation
	Communication & Collaboration


Work Conditions:


	On-site role (Port Harcourt office)
	Monday – Friday, 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM


Benefits


	Competitive Salary of N200,000 Monthly
	Career growth and development opportunities
	Health and wellness support (HMO)
	Friendly and collaborative work environment


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using "Social Media Officer – Port Harcourt" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Medical Officer Job at Federal Polytechnic, Bida




        
    

        
        The Federal Polytechnic, Bida was established in 1977 following a decision of the Federal Government of Nigeria to move the institution to Bida. Before then, it was Federal College of Technology, Kano.

The first academic session started in April 1978 with a population of 211 students and 11 senior staff, 33 junior staff. Federal Polytechnic, Bida is a Federal Government tertiary institution situated in Bida, Niger State, Nigeria. Currently, there are seven faculties in the institution.

Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates to fill the vacant position below:

Job Position: Medical Officer

Job Location: Bida, Niger
Department: Medical Sciences
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Qualification 


	Candidates should possess an MBBS qualification.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Applications alongside their Curriculum Vitae to:
The Registrar,
The Federal Polytechnic, Bida,
P. M. B. 55,
Niger State.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "Acouns Laboratory and Diagnostic Centre is a molecular diagnostic centre in Ajah, Lekki, Lagos State, Nigeria aimed at providing quality and dependable patient test results in order to improve patient outcomes and quality of life.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Acouns Laboratory seeks a highly motivated and creative Business Development Executive (BDE) to drive market expansion, enhance brand visibility, and secure profitable, long-term partnerships.
	This role is a critical blend of strategic marketing, sales execution, and team supervision, focusing on generating revenue by promoting Acouns Laboratory&#39;s comprehensive diagnostic and specialized services to diverse stakeholders.


Key Responsibilities
Strategic Marketing &amp; Campaign Development:


	Responsible for developing and executing unique sales campaign ideas to strategically market Acouns Laboratory services and overall improve brand identity and public perception.
	Conduct in-depth market research to compute target audience demographics, competitor analysis, and identify low-hanging, profitable partnership opportunities with potential clients and stakeholders.
	Review previously successful marketing campaigns, working as part of the team to set goals, define deadlines, and make necessary adjustments throughout active campaigns to achieve better consumer engagement and ROI.
	Supervise the activities of the branding team (including Graphics Designer and Digital Marketer), ensuring the facility is professionally represented across all social media and digital platforms through engaging and value-driven content.


Client Acquisition &amp; Stakeholder Management:


	Drive the acquisition and onboarding of new clients, including doctors, pharmacies, corporate Human Resources departments (for pre-employment screenings), and other commercial entities.
	Woo doctors and key personnel of major hospitals and healthcare facilities by presenting the quality, reliability, and affordability of Acouns Laboratory services.
	Proactively pursue partnerships with primary, secondary, and tertiary healthcare facilities to expand the laboratory&#39;s referral network.
	Act as the primary liaison for the dissemination of information and stakeholder management. Conduct regular visits to prospective clients, active clients, and other key stakeholders to maintain engagement.
	Seek and secure collaborations with Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) engaged in health awareness campaigns (e.g., Breast Cancer, HIV/AIDS, HBV), leveraging these partnerships to increase service reach.
	Sensitize religious bodies and community groups on the importance of routine and annual medical checkups, including pre-marital screening, to boost peaceful and healthy living.


Relationship Management &amp; Administration:


	Build and maintain long-lasting relationships with major stakeholders that guarantee continuous patronage and establish a quality feedback mechanism for continuous service improvement and scaling.
	Design and provide Service Level Agreements (SLAs) that clearly define the scope of services and obligations Acouns Laboratory has with respective clients, ensuring clarity and guaranteeing a long-term business relationship.
	Build a robust Customer Information Sheet (CIS) or database of prospective, active, and non-active clients to enable targeted marketing efforts and effective client relationship management.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Medical Laboratory Science, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2-4 years of progressive experience in business development, sales, or marketing, preferably within the medical diagnostics, laboratory services, or healthcare industry.
	Demonstrated experience in market research, digital marketing oversight, and developing unique sales/marketing campaigns.
	Exceptional relationship-building, negotiation, presentation, and team supervision skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and experience using Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tools.


Skills and Competencies:


	Excellent verbal and written communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and experience using CRM software.
	Demonstrated ability to strategically secure new business accounts and manage a complete sales cycle from prospecting to closing.
	Strong understanding of clinical laboratory testing processes, quality assurance, and the competitive landscape in medical diagnostics and strong drive to meet and exceed targets.
	Ability to identify and capitalize on market opportunities.
	Exceptional relationship-building skills across various levels of client organizations. High level of professionalism, maturity, and discretion when handling confidential and sensitive matters.
	Ability to work independently and manage a territory effectively.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.
	Opportunity to work in a growing, multi-sectoral organization.
	Exposure to modern healthcare technologies.
	Supportive and innovative work environment.
	Competitive remuneration and benefits package.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;workforce.sm@247kpg.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of your mail.

Note:&nbsp;Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until positions are filled.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-28",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Acouns Laboratory and Diagnostic Centre"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }

}



Business Development Executive Job at Acouns Laboratory and Diagnostic Centre




        
    

        
        Acouns Laboratory and Diagnostic Centre is a molecular diagnostic centre in Ajah, Lekki, Lagos State, Nigeria aimed at providing quality and dependable patient test results in order to improve patient outcomes and quality of life.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Acouns Laboratory seeks a highly motivated and creative Business Development Executive (BDE) to drive market expansion, enhance brand visibility, and secure profitable, long-term partnerships.
	This role is a critical blend of strategic marketing, sales execution, and team supervision, focusing on generating revenue by promoting Acouns Laboratory's comprehensive diagnostic and specialized services to diverse stakeholders.


Key Responsibilities
Strategic Marketing & Campaign Development:


	Responsible for developing and executing unique sales campaign ideas to strategically market Acouns Laboratory services and overall improve brand identity and public perception.
	Conduct in-depth market research to compute target audience demographics, competitor analysis, and identify low-hanging, profitable partnership opportunities with potential clients and stakeholders.
	Review previously successful marketing campaigns, working as part of the team to set goals, define deadlines, and make necessary adjustments throughout active campaigns to achieve better consumer engagement and ROI.
	Supervise the activities of the branding team (including Graphics Designer and Digital Marketer), ensuring the facility is professionally represented across all social media and digital platforms through engaging and value-driven content.


Client Acquisition & Stakeholder Management:


	Drive the acquisition and onboarding of new clients, including doctors, pharmacies, corporate Human Resources departments (for pre-employment screenings), and other commercial entities.
	Woo doctors and key personnel of major hospitals and healthcare facilities by presenting the quality, reliability, and affordability of Acouns Laboratory services.
	Proactively pursue partnerships with primary, secondary, and tertiary healthcare facilities to expand the laboratory's referral network.
	Act as the primary liaison for the dissemination of information and stakeholder management. Conduct regular visits to prospective clients, active clients, and other key stakeholders to maintain engagement.
	Seek and secure collaborations with Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) engaged in health awareness campaigns (e.g., Breast Cancer, HIV/AIDS, HBV), leveraging these partnerships to increase service reach.
	Sensitize religious bodies and community groups on the importance of routine and annual medical checkups, including pre-marital screening, to boost peaceful and healthy living.


Relationship Management & Administration:


	Build and maintain long-lasting relationships with major stakeholders that guarantee continuous patronage and establish a quality feedback mechanism for continuous service improvement and scaling.
	Design and provide Service Level Agreements (SLAs) that clearly define the scope of services and obligations Acouns Laboratory has with respective clients, ensuring clarity and guaranteeing a long-term business relationship.
	Build a robust Customer Information Sheet (CIS) or database of prospective, active, and non-active clients to enable targeted marketing efforts and effective client relationship management.


Qualifications and Experience


	Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Medical Laboratory Science, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2-4 years of progressive experience in business development, sales, or marketing, preferably within the medical diagnostics, laboratory services, or healthcare industry.
	Demonstrated experience in market research, digital marketing oversight, and developing unique sales/marketing campaigns.
	Exceptional relationship-building, negotiation, presentation, and team supervision skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and experience using Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tools.


Skills and Competencies:


	Excellent verbal and written communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and experience using CRM software.
	Demonstrated ability to strategically secure new business accounts and manage a complete sales cycle from prospecting to closing.
	Strong understanding of clinical laboratory testing processes, quality assurance, and the competitive landscape in medical diagnostics and strong drive to meet and exceed targets.
	Ability to identify and capitalize on market opportunities.
	Exceptional relationship-building skills across various levels of client organizations. High level of professionalism, maturity, and discretion when handling confidential and sensitive matters.
	Ability to work independently and manage a territory effectively.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.
	Opportunity to work in a growing, multi-sectoral organization.
	Exposure to modern healthcare technologies.
	Supportive and innovative work environment.
	Competitive remuneration and benefits package.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: workforce.sm@247kpg.com using the Job Position as the subject of your mail.

Note: Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until positions are filled.
